paper.title: Perovskite, the Chameleon CO2 Photocatalyst
paper.abstract: The prevalence of perovskite materials in myriad technologies is traceable to their diverse compositions, structures, and forms, variations of which bestow them with chameleon-like properties, functionality, and utility. By modifying the ABO(3) archetype perovskites through isomorphic substitution, aliovalent doping, and non-stoichiometry, as well as tailoring their form through nanostructuring, heterostructuring, superstructuring, and polymorphism, the portfolio of application opportunities for perovskite materials can be greatly expanded. The focus of this perspective is to explore the thought process by which human intelligence and experiential learning enables the discovery of a champion photocatalyst for CO2 hydrogenstion by juggling the elements in perovskite oxides and at which point this well-established approach needs a helping hand from artificial intelligence and machine learning.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要探讨的是钙钛矿材料在CO2光催化领域的应用，以及如何通过人工智能和机器学习优化材料设计。虽然提到了机器学习，但其应用领域是材料科学而非金融。
